summary: The diff implements comprehensive product visibility fixes with extensive logging throughout the product creation and retrieval flow in both backend and frontend. All requirements are addressed with detailed console logging for debugging, cache invalidation after uploads, and verified rendering logic in ProductGrid.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration module (backend/migration.mo) that preserves all state during upgrades
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on fixing product visibility issues and adding logging. Creating a migration system for state preservation was not requested and goes beyond the scope of debugging getAllProducts and cache invalidation.
